text: pheụ̄̀x thī̀ xạllxḥˌ ca thrng yæk khn lew xxk cāk khn dī læa ca thrng h̄ı̂ khn lew sụ̀ng bāng s̄̀wn k̄hxng phwk k̄heā xyū̀ bn xīk bāng s̄̀wn doy thrng s̄um phwk k̄heā thậngh̄md wị̂ pĕnk xng læ̂w phraxngkh̒ ca thrng h̄ı̂ phwk k̄heā xyū̀ nı nrk ỵaḥạnnạm chn h̄el̀ā nī̂ h̄æla phwk k̄heā khụ̄x p̄hū̂ thī̀ k̄hādthun
